channel.title: Weapon healing you on special
channel.description: What I am trying to do is make my saradomin godsword heal the person using it after using its special. I want to try and make it heal half what I hit. Anyone know how to do this :\?

item.title: Weapon healing you on special
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:13, topic:193777”][quote author=n0va k0 link=topic=257941.msg2142317#msg2142317 date=1206754907]
I can tell by what you put, the + would give an error
[/quote]I don’t think so. playerLevel[3] is an integer, and integers are able to be added to, subtracted from, etc.[/quote]

Told you.

client.java:22795: not a statement playerLevel[3] + (hitDiff / 2); ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon healing you on special
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“n0va k0, post:12, topic:193777”]I can tell by what you put, the + would give an error[/quote]I don’t think so. playerLevel[3] is an integer, and integers are able to be added to, subtracted from, etc.

item.title: Weapon healing you on special
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“blitz_9100, post:9, topic:193777”]try this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 && specialAmount >= 50) { ProjectileSpec(282, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX); ProjectileSpec(497, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = specialDamage; usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; setSkillLevel(3, hitDiff / 2, playerLevel[3]); } [/quote]If he were making it heal the person using the special, wouldn’t it be

playerLevel[3] + (hitDiff / 2);

Or something along those lines?

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon healing you on special
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

I want it to heal 20 or so everytime you use the special. From I don’t know… 50 hp and it goes up to 70. I don’t want to change the number to 99…the weapon would be over powered to the others

Blitz, would that make me heal double what I hit?..Since it is hitdif

EDIT: Naw doesn’t work :\

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon healing you on special
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

try this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 && specialAmount >= 50) {
					ProjectileSpec(282, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX);
                                        ProjectileSpec(497, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX);
					calculateSpecial();
					hitDiff = specialDamage;
					usingSpecial = false;
                                        specialDamage = 0;
					specialDamage2 = 0;
                                        setSkillLevel(3, hitDiff / 2, playerLevel[3]);
					}

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon healing you on special
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 && specialAmount >= 50) { ProjectileSpec(282, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX); ProjectileSpec(497, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = specialDamage; usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; setSkillLevel(3, 30, playerLevel[3]); }
:?..No idea lol. It didn’t work though

Am I supposed to add AttackingOn2. or something?

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon healing you on special
item.dc:creator: @xRedemptionx xRedemptionx
item.description:
@xRedemptionx wrote:

This will set the skill to a selected number of your choice.

setSkillLevel(3, YOURNUMBER, playerLevel[3]);

Read full topic
